cause.description:
We all know that our world isn't perfect. But do you really know what is going on in other countries? I am here to try help others. Helping others isn't always with money, there are other ways. Visit the site www.amnestyusa.org where you will find various cases around the world that may be helped by i simple petition to sign or maybe even an e-mail to help persuade others to do good. If you are one of those people who think that "we have enough problems in our country, why should we help theres" WAKE UP! Do you have the right to protest? I mean protest about anything? Because if you have the right to say what you want wear you want, can you imagine being without that? Can you imagine being thrown in jail to rot for 6 years without any kind of trail? What if that was you, would you want someone to help? I would. So please join me at Amnesty International and see how you can make a difference. If some of you have troubles with finding a way to help please contact me at this e-mail address : nocturnalvisions89@yahoo.com
1. INTERNAIONAL HUMAN RIGHTS!
2. INTERNATIONAL FREEDOM OF SPEECH!
3. INTERNATIONAL RIGHT TO FAIR TRAILS!
cause.name: Amnesty International USA
